content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.T_STConsignment') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.T_STConsignment
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.T_STConsignment (
[lms_consignment_id] int,
[lms_consignment_cref] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_consignment_cdate] datetime2(7),
[lms_consignment_userid] int,
[lms_consignment_appointment] datetime2(7),
[lms_consignment_deliverby] datetime2(7),
[lms_consignment_deliverbyoriginal] datetime2(7),
[lms_consignment_custaccid] int,
[lms_consignment_billcust] int,
[lms_consignment_delivercustid] int,
[lms_consignment_inservicereasonid] int,
[lms_consignment_inservicecomment] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_consignment_lastupdate] datetime2(7),
[lms_consignment_collectid] int,
[lms_consignment_delivertypeid] int,
[lms_consignment_billtypeid] int,
[lms_consignment_loadid] int,
[lms_consignment_totalcharge] numeric(36,8),
[lms_consignment_charge] numeric(36,8),
[lms_consignment_docfees] numeric(36,8),
[lms_consignment_fuellevy] numeric(36,8),
[lms_consignment_totothersurcharges] numeric(36,8),
[lms_parcelbyconsignment_aggrweight] numeric(36,8),
[lms_parcelbyconsignment_aggrchargeweight] numeric(36,8),
[lms_parcelbyconsignment_aggrvolweight] numeric(36,8),
[lms_parcelbyconsignment_aggrvolumiserweight] numeric(36,8),
[lms_parcelbyconsignment_aggrmaxweight] numeric(36,8),
[lms_parcelbyconsignment_aggrnoparcels] bigint,
[lms_parcelbyconsignment_aggrweightexclspecdel] numeric(36,8),
[lms_parcelbyconsignment_aggrchargeweightexclspecdel] numeric(36,8),
[lms_parcelbyconsignment_aggrvolweightexclspecdel] numeric(36,8),
[lms_parcelbyconsignment_aggrvolumiserweightexclspecdel] numeric(36,8),
[lms_parcelbyconsignment_aggrmaxweightexclspecdel] numeric(36,8),
[lms_parcelbyconsignment_aggrnoparcelsexclspecdel] bigint,
[lms_billconsignmentr_id] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_consignid] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_updatedate] datetime2(7),
[lms_billconsignmentr_pickuprouteid] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_deliverrouteid] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_chargeweight] numeric(36,8),
[lms_billconsignmentr_noofparcels] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_tripdistance] numeric(36,8),
[lms_billconsignmentr_consignmentvalue] numeric(36,8),
[lms_billconsignmentr_billcust] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_redflag] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_updind] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_servicetypeid] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_routemissingind] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_chargescalcind] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_cdate1] datetime2(7),
[lms_billconsignmentr_invalidpcode] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_programno] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_totrate] numeric(36,8),
[lms_billconsignmentr_routecharge] numeric(36,8),
[lms_billconsignmentr_minweight] numeric(36,8),
[lms_billconsignmentr_minrate] numeric(36,8),
[lms_billconsignmentr_corderno] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_billconsignmentr_custref] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_billconsignmentr_manualupdateflag] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_prevbillcustid] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_specdelvehicleid] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_specdelmissingrouteflag] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_overborderflag] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_samedeliverid] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_combineroutecharge] numeric(36,8),
[lms_billconsignmentr_waybillid] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_routelinecount] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_samedelcount] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_aweight] numeric(36,8),
[lms_billconsignmentr_vweight] numeric(36,8),
[lms_billconsignmentr_custref3] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_billconsignmentr_units] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_totsurcharges] numeric(36,8),
[lms_billconsignmentr_noofpallets] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_invalidpudel] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_sharikaflag] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_sapid] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_totfuelsurcharge] numeric(36,8),
[lms_billconsignmentr_totdocsurcharge] numeric(36,8),
[lms_billconsignmentr_totothersurcharge] numeric(36,8),
[lms_billconsignmentr_specdel] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_quoteflag] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_billperiod] nvarchar(4000),
[lms_billconsignmentr_billweekr] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_billperiodflag] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_surhargeflag] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_recalcflag] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_quotemissingflag] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_delivertypeid] int,
[lms_billconsignmentr_totcovidsurcharge] numeric(36,8),
[lms_consignment_maxpoddate] datetime2(7),
[lms_consignment_inserviceflag] int,
[lms_consignment_actualleaddaysstartdate] datetime2(7),
[lms_consignment_actualleaddaysenddate] datetime2(7),
[lms_consignment_actualleaddays] float,
[lms_consignment_actualleaddaysinclwe] float,
[lms_consignment_cdateroundup] datetime2(7),
[lms_consignment_age] nvarchar(4000),
[consignagedifferenceinseconds] int,




	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Structured Data/OPS/stconsignment.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.T_STConsignment 
GO
